name: Arx Fatalis
description: Uses Arx Libertatis with the GOG installer  >v1.2

files.arxdata: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
exe: arx
files:
- arx-libertatis-x64: http://arx-libertatis.org/files/arx-libertatis-1.1.2-linux.tar.xz
- arxdata: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/libertatis
    file: arx-libertatis-x64
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/libertatis
- execute:
    args: --source $arxdata --data-dir $GAMEDIR/data
    file: $GAMEDIR/arx-install-data
